name: saas-template
description: Full-stack SaaS template with React Router 7, Expo, and shared packages

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../packages/shared && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=web && npm run test --workspace=packages/shared
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=web && npm run typecheck --workspace=mobile && npm run typecheck --workspace=packages/shared
